name: GAD-7
description: Generalized Anxiety Disorder-7 (measures severity of anxiety)
questions: Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge
Not being able to stop or control worrying
Worrying too much about different things
Being so restless that it's hard to sit still
Feeling afraid as if something awful might happen
note: Some sources consider a threshold of 10 or more as a red flag requiring further evaluation.
